data.name: I H8 Ur Face
data.detailed_description:
I H8 Ur Face is a modern stress and rage management game. Why let the rage build until it has real world consequences when you can load an image of your target onto our dummy and release the beast....don't have a face you hate? Then just smack the crap out of our stock target and feel the rage drift away with every swing. Take screen shots of the beat down. Choose from bare fists, Boxing gloves wrapped in barbed wire, Brass Knuckles, Baseball Bat, Wrench, Crowbar, Flamethrower, Pistols or a Crossbow. Spit on the target. Explode it's head with a single keystroke! Heal the Target so you can give it a fresh beat down. Choose from multiple backgrounds. Don't let your stress and rage fester....manage it!


*For entertainment purposes only*

data.short_description: Want to slap the sh*t out of someone but don't want to do time for it? Load an image of the poor bastard on to the dummy and release your rage!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
